ColourWords.Title: Food (countable and uncountable nouns)
ColourWords.Instruction: Click on all the uncountable nouns in the dialogue. There are seven.

Content.Sentence:
A: Hi, Sally. I’m in the supermarket.
B: Oh hi, Jen.
A: I haven’t got my shopping list. What food do we need?
B: Here’s the list. Right. We need some eggs and some bread rolls for breakfast.
A: What about coffee and milk?
B: No, it’s okay, we’ve got them.
A: And have we got any sausages?
B: No, so buy some of them. We also need some fruit. Can you get some bananas and some oranges.
A: Okay.
B: And we haven’t got any cereal. We’ve got biscuits but we need some cheese.
A: Fine. Is that all?
B: I think so. Oh no, can you get some butter?
A: Okay.
B: I can’t think of anything else.
A: Okay, see you later. Bye.
B: Bye.
